item.title: Mojo Integration Tests with LXD
item.author: tim@backgroundprocess.com (Tim Kuhlman)
item.description: I have recently finished building an LXD image for doing integration tests of Mojo. I did this because I wanted to be able to reliably test the changes to Mojo that I was making. A repeatable, standard environment that can run set of integration tests fits the bill.
